code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{web3,mailContract}from'./utils/web3';import SendMessage from'./components/SendMessage';import Inbox from'./components/Inbox';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const App=()=>{const[account,setAccount]=useState('');useEffect(()=>{async function loadAccount(){const accounts=await web3.eth.getAccounts();setAccount(accounts[0]);}loadAccount();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"App",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Decentralized Mail System"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Connected Account: ",account]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(SendMessage,{account:account,mailContract:mailContract}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Inbox,{account:account,mailContract:mailContract})]});};export default App;
